Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, are you the new farmer who just
moved into town? I'm Gunther. Pleasure to
meet'cha.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
G'morning, <MYNAME>. How are you feeling
today?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
G'morning, <MYNAME>. You certainly seem
lively, considering how early it is!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
G'morning, <MYNAME>. How's the farm coming
along?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ello, <MYNAME>. How's the farm doin'? Hope
you're not overworking yourself!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evenin'. All done with your work for
today?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evenin', <MYNAME>. Already done with a
good day's work?

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）

Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Lovely day today, ain't it? Seems like fine
weather for a walk.
<PAGE>
Did ya know you can get lumber by chopping
logs and branches with an axe? We offer it at
the shop too, but I only have a bit in stock.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Blarrrg, it's raining today. I hate the rain. Gets
the lumber all wet.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, it's a beautiful day out there. Days like
these, I feel like takin' a walk.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The weather's gettin' on my nerves today. The
humidity ain't helping things either...

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ahhh, the weather's really nice today. I feel like
travelin' somewhere.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like rainy days. So damp and humid, I feel
like mushrooms might sprout up on me any
second.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, the air's nice and clean today. I'm feelin' tip-
top, aye.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...snowing today. Ah well, hope it melts
off by tomorrow.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, what in the world are you doing out in this
weather? You oughtta go home soon.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, hold on there. What in the world are you
doing out here in this much snow? You oughtta
go home soon.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I heard you've started dating
someone. That's good to hear.
<PAGE>
Be sure to invite me to the weddin', aye?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm in town, this is usually where you'll
find me, working away.
<PAGE>
Best to keep away from the bench, though!
Don't want'cha to get hurt.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Maurice sometimes comes here to chat with
me. We mainly talk about our carpentry projects,
or fishing, or whatever else comes up.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Shhhh... Please, try to be quiet. You'll scare
the fish.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear there's a nice spot for fishin' deep in the
forest, but I've never been there myself.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There're plenty of good trees left around here.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There sure are plenty'a fish in the river, and I
know -- I fish here a lot.
<PAGE>
So don't be throwin' any trash in the river,
y'hear? Those waters belong to everyone!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my regular walking route. I don't deviate
from the path! I just walk...

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear there are some big fish around here -- real
"river king" types.
<PAGE>
Now, I come here a lot to fish, but I've never
landed a real whopper.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've heard rice grows pretty well here.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard Elise has been using this paddy. That
girl... She's quite the hard worker, eh?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes, I think about going way out into the
wilderness and exploring, but then I remember
that I don't much care for hiking.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I'm in good spirits, it's hard to focus on
work. I just wanna go out for a nice, long walk.
Nothin' finer!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's farm life treatin' ya? If you harvest some
good vegetables, you oughtta bring me some.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, do you like fishing?
<PAGE>
If you're ever lookin' for some good spots, just
ask me. I've been fishin' in the river 'round here
for years.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How are things goin'? If you ever feel your house
is too small, just come straight to me and we'll
find a good plan that works for you.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was born and raised right here in this town.
<PAGE>
'Cause of that, the people here are more than
just neighbors. They're almost like my kin.
<PAGE>
And now, you're one of 'em, so if you ever run
into any problems, you can come talk with 'ol
Gunther anytime.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Are you gettin' enough to eat?
<PAGE>
No matter how busy you are, a hard worker like
you needs three squares a day. You can't be
productive if your stomach's rumblin' all day.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come from a long line of carpenters in this
town.
<PAGE>
One of my ancestors was apparently even
among the group who first founded Oak Tree
Town.
<PAGE>
I trained under my father ever since I was a wee
lad, so I know I've got top-notch carpentry skills.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like how you get along so well with everyone in
town.
<PAGE>
Though, I hear rumors about you sometimes.
People say you're workin' yourself too hard.
<PAGE>
It's thanks to you this town became a bit more
lively, so be sure to get enough rest and keep up
the good work.

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this's for me, huh? How'd you know it's my
favorite? Thank you!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this's for me, huh? A tasteful choice, aye.
<PAGE>
I'll gladly take it. Thank you!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you know I like these, huh? Looks like you
know my tastes pretty well. Thanks!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this a present for me? Thanks.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Is this for me...? ...Well, I suppose I'll take
it, then.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Blarrrgh, can't say I like these...but, since you're
so thoughtful, I suppose I'll take it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Blech...I really hate these more than anything.
But since this one's a present from you, I'll grit
my teeth and accept it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is pretty flashy. If you want me to
have it, I'll take it. Thanks.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is pretty flashy. If you want me to
have it, I'll take it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is pretty flashy. If you want me to
have it, I'll take it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Wow, this is pretty flashy. Well, I'd hate to waste
a good gift, so I'll take it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...It's all shinin' and gold. It's not really my kinda
thing, but hey, I'll take it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...It's shinin' and gold. I don't really like it, but
hey, I'll take it.
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't feel up to taking any gifts now. Sorry,
just save it for later.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm all full-up for presents today. Just save it for
next time.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A present for my birthday? Come to think
of it, today IS my birthday! And hey, you
remembered it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, how'd you know these were my favorite?
Thank you!

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Huh?! A present for my birthday...?!
<PAGE>
Oh...I guess you're right. My birthday IS today,
huh? I'm glad you remembered it, because it
seems I didn't.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! Quite a nice gift ...Wait, a birthday gift?
<PAGE>
I see... Thank you. Gotta admit, I forgot it was
coming up.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? A present for my birthday?! Oh, thank you
kindly.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Is this for me...? ...A birthday present, is
it? Then I suppose I'll accept it. Thanks.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...What? A birthday present? You want to give
me this...? Well, I suppose I'll take it. I hate to
see things go to waste.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...What? You're actually giving me this as a
birthday gift?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Well, since it's from you, I'll suppose I'll try to
accept it with a measure o' grace.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, this is pretty flashy. It's a present for
my birthday, you say? Well, if that's the case, I'll
take it. Thanks.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is pretty flashy. Well, I hate to see
good intentions go to waste, so I'll take it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, there's a real cute one there.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's an ermine! Cute little thing, ain't it?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've never seen a rabbit like this, but it's kinda
cuddly.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This little fella is kinda cute.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now this is a nice chicken. When it lays some
eggs, you're always welcome to bring some by.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Grahaha, this dog has a cute face.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This dog should get some exercise, or else it'll
look like a sausage that grew some legs.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, who's a good dog? You are, aren'tcha? This
dog's got a smart face, y'know.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is a nice dog, but it's lookin' awfully fat.
Maybe you should get it a bit more exercise.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haha, this here's a cute little kitty.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
It might not be such a good idea to let yer cat
get this fat.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Awww, this cat's hair looks so fluffy.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Is this cat really fluffy, or just kinda obese?
Maybe cut down on the food, there.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a pretty flower. It's a present for the
Flower Fair, right? Thank you.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather, eh...? That's for flashin' at
someone you love, though.
<PAGE>
I'm tellin' you for your own good. You oughtta
keep that feather somewhere safe until you meet
someone special.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so you've got a ring there, do you? Already
found someone you want to give it to?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's some beautiful wrapping paper. My
favorite color, in fact. Now, what could be
inside?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. D'ya know what day today is?
<PAGE>
...Happy birthday! It's nothin' fancy, but here's a
little somethin' from me.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard today's your birthday. Hope you have a
good 'un!

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Feels like I haven't seen ya for
an age. Work been keepin' you busy?
<PAGE>
It's good to work hard, but stop by and visit
sometime.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those are some nice workin' clothes you've got
there. They look comfortable to move around in.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those are some nice workin' clothes you've got
there. They look comfortable to move around in.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you've got some nice clothes on today,
huh?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a dandy outfit you've got there, eh?

huh?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice wooden box -- perfect size. I could
use it to store tools or materials.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's the first scarecrow I've seen in a while...

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You plannin' on building somethin' with those
bricks? If you don't need 'em, I'll take 'em off
your hands.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can't really use that old cart, can you? You
want me to fix it?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Beacons really cast a unique sort of light, don't
they?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice stone lantern you've got there.
Seems perfect for a garden.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a decent-looking column, but are you
planning to prop anything up with it?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A totem pole, huh...? It actually seems pretty
well-crafted.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The shape of this table is strange. I think I kinda
like it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Any carpenter worth his salt could make a log
chair like that.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now there's a strange statue. You plannin' to
have a festival or something?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This pump reminds me of what we had when I
was a lad. You don't see 'em around much
anymore, though.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if there're fish in that pond.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if there're fish in that pond.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can you get water from this well? If you can,
the town could really benefit from it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town doesn't really need a watchtower,
does it?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A high horizontal bar, eh? I think my days o'
youthful athleticism are behind me now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice plaza. Looks like a good place to
take a walk.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That tree's got a nice color to it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That pole's got a nice color to it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That gate's got a nice color to it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A bamboo ornament... You sure do have some
unique tastes. Feels like I've seen that kinda thing
somewhere before.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunflowers are my favorite flower, so it'd be
great if you plant a lot of 'em.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunflowers are my favorite flower, so it'd be
great if you plant a lot of 'em.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a beautiful sight to see maidenhair trees'
leaves turn yellow.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town looks nicer with hedges like these.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a beautiful sight to see maidenhair trees'
leaves turn yellow.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this fence. Maybe 'cause it's my favorite
color.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I see a lot of yellow decorations -- my
favorite! I see you've got pretty good taste.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When I see something red, I feel a bit more
upbeat. My wife Corona likes red too. You've got
good taste.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The decorations here make me feel relaxed. Like
a nice bath, y'know?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Y'got some pretty chic decorations here. It's
good to look at those kinds'a things now and
then.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, there's a bamboo grove here? That's nice
t'see.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Corona told me that I look like a daruma. ...What
do you think? Do I?

Content.VardId: 町の発展MSG　//特定住人専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town's become pretty famous, eh? I see
people from all over the world visitin' us here.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Compared to several years ago, this town's
become pretty well-known.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been livin' in this town since the day I was
born, but I've got no complaints. This town's a
quiet place, and that's how I like it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I've got no problem with the town
becomin' more famous, but I don't want it to be
more busy and crowded than it is now.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I sometimes go to other towns for work, but I
don't meet many folks who know about this
town.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm surprised that the town became this famous.
Folks from all over the world visit us now.

Content.VardId: 町ブラ専用MSG　//モブ専用会話
メイド、下僕用MSG　//モブ専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here you go; this is today's allowance. Be sure
to spend it wisely.

Content.VardId: アイテム入手メッセージ
